snippet: Officials hope that making such information available, in searchable online form, will eventually lead to pressure for emissions cuts.
abstract: Environmental Protection Agency will publish detailed information on sources of greenhouse gas emissions in the form of a searchable computerized map on its Web site; hopes that by spreading information pressure will mount for emissions cuts.
lead_paragraph: Officials hope that making such information available, in searchable online form, will eventually lead to pressure for emissions cuts.

headline.seo: E.P.A. Unveils Map of Major Greenhouse Gas Producers
headline.main: Online Map Shows Biggest Greenhouse Gas Emitters
headline.print_headline: Online Map Shows Biggest Greenhouse Gas Emitters
